titleStmt.title: A briefe treatise touching the preservation of the eie sight consisting partly in good order of diet, and partly in vse of medicines.
titleStmt.author: Baley, Walter, 1529-1592.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ioseph Barnes, Printer to the Vniversitie,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
